artist: Artist: Sascha Scatter; Publisher: Sascha Scatter , Oakland
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, xerographic illustration of a figure, who appears as if under an X-ray, with bones and heart visible, crossing train tracks towards a fence of barbed wire on the left edge; 92 pp.
title: El Otro Lado (The Other Side)
